item.title: 508 Yell in wilderness
item.dc:creator: @danielbw danielbw
item.description:
@danielbw wrote:

How can i make it so every one can use ::yell in the wilderness?

my base is Primadude’s Summon-pkz 508
theres my ::yell command

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (p.muteType > 0) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You are muted and cannot yell until an administrator unmutes you."); return; } if (playerCommand.equals("jcscape") || playerCommand.equals("project destiny")) return; if (p.rights == 0) player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<col=C12DBF>[Player] "+p.username+": "+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights == 1) player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<col=0F92EE>[Moderator]<img=0>"+p.username+": "+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2) player.frames.sendMessage(player, "<col=ff0000>[Administrator]<img=1>"+p.username+": "+playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }

Read full topic
